summary.span: 指定文件的 SHA1 哈希。

span.span: Specifies the SHA1 hash of the file.

value.span: 一个字符串，指示文件的 SHA1 哈希。

span.span: A string indicating the SHA1 hash of the file.

remarks.span: 由于 SHA1 出现冲突问题，Microsoft 建议使用基于 SHA256 或更好的安全模型。

span.span: Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256 or better.

summary.span: 指定文件的解析路径。

span.span: Specifies the resolved path to the file.

summary.span: 此路径由 Resolve 方法确定，用于通过 UpdateFileInfo 方法计算文件信息。

span.span: This path is determined by the Resolve method, and is used to compute the file information by the UpdateFileInfo method.

value.span: 指示文件的解析路径的字符串。

span.span: A string indicating the resolved path to the file.

protected public: abstract property System::String ^ SortName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值用于对应用程序清单中的引用程序集进行排序。

span.span: Gets a value that is used to sort the referenced assemblies in the application manifest.
The name to sort by.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于对应用程序清单中引用的程序集进行排序。This property is used to sort the referenced assemblies in the application manifest. 清单首先按字母顺序列出必备组件，然后按字母顺序列出安装的程序集。The manifest lists prerequisite assemblies in alphabetical order first, followed by installed assemblies in alphabetical order. 程序集根据引用的进行排序 。The assemblies are sorted according to the of the reference.
